original: intros H. induction n as [|n IH]. -- simpl. apply (is_derive_Reals (fun _ : R => 1) x 0). apply (derivable_pt_lim_finite_sum (fun _ : nat => 1) x 0). -- simpl. rewrite (mult_comm n (f x)). apply is_derive_scal. apply is_derive_mult. ++ apply IH. auto. ++ apply H.
